title: def _test_network_api(self, method, rpc_method, **kwargs) is broken

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lifeless

comments.content:
Nice catch, I've confirmed that there is a failure if you raise the AssertionError:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/44190/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/42043
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/42043
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/6c1f40bbbe1fd2051abd7dbd2e1c218ef0bec590
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6c1f40bbbe1fd2051abd7dbd2e1c218ef0bec590
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Aug 14 18:29:33 2013 -0700

    Raises masked AssertionError in _test_network_api
    
    The _test_network_api method was catching an AssertionError to do some
    more checking but failed to raise the original error if the checking
    didn't hit any matches. This patch fixes the test to raise the original
    assertion error.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1212017
    
    Change-Id: I33147d18e33cd4babfc3f5cb572007bc7e4c07e6
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
